name: jkdn-movie
description: A tailwindcss boilerplate that makes development easy.

scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently " node backtolocal.js " "postcss src/css/tailwind.css -o dist/assets/css/main.css --watch"   "instant -p 4343 ./dist"
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently " node changetocdn.js " " postcss src/css/tailwind.css -o dist/assets/css/main.css "

author: Emmanuel Raymond
